name: Turbo River Racing Ship
description:
Steer your ship, collect coins, upgrade or buy a new ship. Endless arcade racing on a ship with an interesting physics behavior of the ship.

Features:
- Realistic ships;
- Realistic terrain;
- Multiple ships to choose from;
- Three different areas;
- Different obstacles;
- Wind helps and sometimes hinders ship-handling;
- Improve your ship in the game menu;
- Improvements bonus skills;
- Availability of different bonuses for the ship (anchor magnet);
- Next Gen Graphics;
- Two modes of control of the ship;

Game:
- Touch-sensitive controls movement from side to side;
- Management of the accelerometer;
- Ability to use found or bought items such as anchor, clean wind, a magnet;
